config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The getMedia() method is used to retrieve the CSS media of the user agent. It first checks if the media value is stored in the hints map, if not, it falls back to the superclass method to get the media value.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getMedia() method is called in the system. The frequency of triggering depends on how often the method is invoked in the code.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'MEDIA' configuration option is limited to the CSS media value of the user agent. It does not have a significant impact on the overall system functionality.
